originalText.text: Matthew Edelman was one of the most professional and informed brokers in NYC. He was very active in finding me a condo as a first time buyer and always looked out for my best interest and never hesitated to offer an honest opinion. An extremely organized, meticulous, and driven individual, Matthew and his team never ceased to be resourceful during the purchase process. Highly recommended for all looking to purchase.

text.text: Matthew Edelman was one of the most professional and informed brokers in NYC. originalText.text: Matthew Edelman is the best agent I have worked with thus far. He was available when needed, extremely communicative and very clearly had my best interests at heart. He worked hard to find me exactly what I was looking for all while treating me as his number one priority. I have worked with a few real estate agents so far, yet I can safely say no one is more hardworking, kind, supportive and on your side as he is. Matthew Edelman is a 5 star agent and I will be highly recommending him to anyone I know.

originalText.text:
Matt Edelman and his team are true professionals with a lot market knowledge. I’m glad to have hired him for the rental of a condo unit. His process was very transparent and understanding every step along the way. I look forward to working Matt in the future to sell my UWS investment property.

All the best,
Ian

originalText.text: Matthew takes a very hands on and personal approach to finding your next apartment. He is very communicative and extremely professional, and goes above and beyond to really understand his clients needs. I would definitely recommend him to anyone looking for a spot in the NYC area.

text.text: Matthew takes a very hands on and personal approach to finding your next apartment. He is very communicative and extremely professional, and goes above and beyond to really understand his clients needs. I would definitely recommend him to anyone looking for a spot in the NYC area.

originalText.text: Would highly recommend Matt to anyone looking for a professional and hard working agent! This was my first time working with Matt and the Douglas Elliman team and my apartment sold in record time. The process was as smooth as possible. It was truly a pleasure working with Matt.
